name: Fish N' Chip
description: Fish N’ Chip is a Collect-a-thon platformer in which the player takes the role of “Chip,” an anthropomorphic catfish who seeks to create the greatest sushi platter ever assembled. To do so, he must kill his aquatic brethren and turn their delicious bits into even more delicious sushi. Wielding his trusty cooking utensils, he must cut out the fat in order to make his way in the cutthroat ocean of sushi restaurants.
